name: Monster in the Rain
description:
))) with audio )))

Made with Adobe Fresco on iPhone. Dia used her finger to draw, I helped her with changing tools depending on what she wanted to do (resizing, paint, move, erase) and then exporting as a timelapse. 

I asked if she'd like to attach a song to the video, she quickly said yes. So, record audio on Adobe Rush and export it as video. 

Warning: audio is not our finest, embarrassing considering Dia's father is a mixing engineer. LOL. He'd probably join in our exploration later on after seeing this (is this intentional?!)

--

This project is a collaborative & learning platform between a tired mother and her (almost) 3 years old. Art, Crafts, and Music have always been her interest along with running around the house and climbing stuff. 

Support our journey into NFT by collecting our creations or connect with us via Twitter. We'd love to make some new friends!
